parameters.name: Cause
parameters.description: The cause of the failure. The value must be 1 to 4,096 characters in length.

parameters.name: Error
parameters.description: The error code for the failed task. The value must be 1 to 128 characters in length.

parameters.name: RequestId
parameters.description: The request ID. If you specify this parameter, the system uses this value as the ID of the request. If you do not specify this parameter, the system generates a value at random.

parameters.name: TaskToken
parameters.description: The token of the specified task that you want to report. If this parameter appears in **waitforCallback** mode, the parameter is passed to the called service, such as Message Service (MNS) or Function Compute. For MNS, the value of this parameter can be obtained from a message. For Function Compute, the value of this parameter can be obtained from an event.
